extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Plugin Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of the Advanced Custom Fields WordPress plugin (both Free and Pro versions) to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed plugin version 6.1.5 or below?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Advanced Custom Fields Plugin
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Advanced Custom Fields WordPress plugin (both Free and Pro versions) to at least version 6.1.6 to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: Advanced Custom Fields WordPress Plugin Vulnerability
affected_products: Advanced Custom Fields WordPress plugin (Free version) <= 6.1.5
Advanced Custom Fields Pro WordPress plugin (Pro version) <= 6.1.5
